name: Shazam
story: The OG of all music recognition apps on any mobile device.

name: Forplay Catalog
story: One of the largest costume and club wear manufacturer/designer in the world.
details: Create both E-commerce site and marketing campaign for both online and offline use.

name: Vladivar Vodka
story: Generating a buzz for our favorite Vodka
details: This was an underground campaign aiming Vladivar Vodka at the "Club scene".

name: Animoto
story: Turn your photos, video clips, and music into stunning video masterpieces!

name: Sweety High
story: The first gamified social platform for girls under 16.
details: Create and design a social platform that encourages girls to express freely in an safe, positive environment!

name: Machinema
story: The dominant video entertainment network for gamers around the world showcasing gameplay, original shows, game trailers and news.

name: Tunecore
story:
Tunecore allows you to distribute your music on iTune like eating a cake.

Mmm... cake.
details: Create a music discovery iPhone app that allows folks to explore local talents.

name: Wolferman's
story: Best muffin's you can get anywhere.  Period.
details: Design and create the ecommerce application that will ship these delicious English muffins directly to you.
